website_summaries.verdict: The best hybrid memory foam and coil mattress from Linenspa with a good combination of support and comfort.
pros: Combination memory foam and innerspring mattress offers better squish and give on the surface while remaining firm underneath with the springs
Can minimize pain from pressure points by contouring to the body's shape
cons: The thickness of the mattress may be too thin for smaller, shorter platform beds

customer_reviews.title: BED BUGS
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mattress a few minutes ago, but I wont even open the plastic around it because I looked around tye rolled mattress and it is absolutely infested with bed bugs!! GROSS!! Its so bad I wont even waste my time putting a bed bug cover protection around it, Im not going to take that risk. Im so disgusted and upset. I needed a mattress for my kid cause in 2 days I'll have last minute guests over, now I wont have a mattress for my kid anymore and have 1 day to find a mattress somewhere else. Do not buy, this is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Contains bed bug eggs
customer_reviews.text: Recieved mattress today and took it outside to open and let off-gas. I immediately noticed some "dirt" under the plastic. I had read another review about a mattress from LinenSpa that contained bedbugs, so i looked up images of bed bugs and their eggs. These appear to be bed bug eggs. I will be returning asap.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: LIVE BUG UNDER PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I unrolled the mattress and cut a hole in the plastic. The mattress started to expand, which was, admittedly, cool. But then I noticed a small, live bug under the plastic. Flea? Bedbug? I don’t know. I did look at reviews from Linenspa’s 6” spring mattress and people have found bedbugs under the plastic in those. I can’t speak to the comfort of the mattress because I never got to lay on it. Just taped it up and took it to the garage. I will say that Amazon was fantastic about quickly offering a refund, without question.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Just like heaven
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this bed, but I was wrong. This is so comfortable. It is firm enough for support, yet the memory foam makes it soft enough to take the pressure off my hips and shoulder; I'm a side sleeper. Now, all my kids want their beds replaced with this one too!
customer_reviews.author: JulieBird

customer_reviews.title: Came with Chinese bugs!
customer_reviews.text: So, the mattress was comfortable and all with only one problem. There were freaking bugs inside it that were incubating! Our pest control person thinks the bugs may have come from where it was manufactured in China. We torched that thing so quick it wasn't funny. In short, the comfort was great, sleep quality was great, but the weird Chinese bug infestation was a nightmare. Some products from overseas are not worth the cheaper price. Buyer Beware!!!! I highly recommend you take another look at other inexpensive "American Made" mattresses. I repeat myself, THERE WERE BUGS INCUBATING INSIDE THE MATTRESS!!!!!! RUN FAR AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua brown

customer_reviews.title: This thing is dope (that's good)
customer_reviews.text: Made my dreams come, true, literally. I needed this for temporary housing, bought it in twin....didn't expect much for the price and I just needed a cheap temporary bed. Honestly probably the best mattress I've ever owned at any price.
customer_reviews.author: MBanas

customer_reviews.title: Not medium firm.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 250lbs, I wanted a medium firm mattress, this thing feels extreme soft. The springs feel like they are made of a weak springy metal. I'm stuck with this mattress for the next ten years now.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Buying another one!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my 2nd one! Great mattress! Great price! I read countless reviews on mattresses in the same category and thought this one would be a good choice. It does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I havent even opened the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the bed bugs are still being shipped as an addition to the mattresses! I havent even opened the vacuum sealed packaging, and its disgusting. I tried wiping it off to see if maybe it was on the plastic, but no. Its inside the plastic. Now, I can't tell if its bugs or debris (husband says bugs) but either way, how is this at all ok to be shipping to people??? Just gross. We will be returning both mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: after taking a nap on it, I bought a full sized one for my bed
customer_reviews.text: I had not realized it would be a rolled up item, but actually made it easier to deal with had a chemical odor at first, but several hours later the scent had dissipated I bought this for a spare bed, but after taking a nap on it, I bought a full sized one for my bed....
customer_reviews.author: LMF

customer_reviews.title: it seemed to be very comfortable. Great price and I received it ahead of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a guest bed and when I tried it, it seemed to be very comfortable. Great price and I received it ahead of schedule! I would recommend Linenspa products to anybody who is looking for quality at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited about getting this after reading all of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about getting this after reading all of the positive reviews....and for the price I can't complain. But you know that saying "You get what you pay for"...well that's very true for this product...except that I think I still may have over paid...I would have rather bought a used mattress that was better quality than this thing. For my 60 pound young son it's not a big deal...he could sleep on the floor and be comfortable. You can feel the springs when you lay on it and the topper feels thin. If you are desperate for something cheap and are young with no body issues this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Mattress, Easy Set Up!
customer_reviews.text: We received our mattress in only 2 days! Like many have said, it’s packaged efficiently and has such an easy set up. Pretty entertaining watching it unfold! ;-) My 9-year-old daughter LOVES this mattress! I think it’s comfortable too. We bought the 8 inch for a day bed and since it’s worked well, I’ve ordered a 6 inch for the trundle underneath that is only used for sleepovers. 4 stars because our mattress only measures about 7.5 inches while others have reported theirs is actually 8. Not certain if this really makes a difference, but thought I should include it in the review.
customer_reviews.author: Larri

customer_reviews.title: Twin size great, full size not great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a twin size and a full size mattress. Received them fast. I opened them both the same time. The twin opened up fully in about 2 hours, but the full size has not fully expanded in 2 days. It seems uneven around the edges. I noticed when I opened the full size mattress, it seemed to explode upon opening. I'm thinking that maybe they are compressing the full size one too much. The twin busted open, but not exploding open like the full. Will see how it works out. The twin seems nice and its soft.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress for my toddler son. With his weight on it, this mattress is great. My husband and I both noticed that when we had the mattress on the floor (before we built his bed) our weight would make us hit the floor when we sat on the mattress. That made me a little nervous but I haven't noticed any issues now that this is actually being used in a bed!
customer_reviews.author: DejaTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT mattress for around a Benjamin!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive of buying a cheap mattress online without ever seeing or feeling it. Our last mattress was a super fancy $3k job we picked out over an entire weekend of visiting all the mattress stores around. However, this time we were just outfitting a guest room that would only be used every now and then. This was kind of a gamble, but it paid off! The materials feel great, the foam top is nice, and the mattress offers good support, so my most recent guest has informed me. I'm super happy with this and will be buying this in other sizes as we outfit the other two guest rooms in our new house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our kids, but ended up stealing my daughters to sleep on for the last 3 months of my pregnancy. It saved me! Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: thewhitebench

customer_reviews.title: Bedbug
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. I was so stupid to buy this mattress without reading the customer reviews. This mattress had 4.5 stars rating, and I figured it was no brainer for the price and the rating. I woke up in the middle of the night with itches all over my body. Long story short, bedbugs came with the bed. Wrap the bed in plastic garbage bags and left it far away from my place. Never suspected that the new bed comes with bedbugs. I lived in the bedbug infested building once, and it was a terrible experience. It is not worth it. AVOID this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Young K

customer_reviews.title: Not bedbugs
customer_reviews.text: I just received my mattress today. I read reviews and of course first thing I did was a bedbug check. They are not bedbugs. I even busted out the old electronic microscope. Just random material that finds it's way in before it gets sealed. Absolutely ignore the idiots who just sheeple their way to bedbug conclusions
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest flimsiest so called mattress I have EVER seen! It is cheaply made and very uncomfortable. When laying on the mattress all you feel is wire coils in your back!! DO NOT buy this product! I regret buying it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: charla

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the few reviews available were all very good, unfortunately I have to say that this mattress is not a good purchase. I gave it the time to reach it shape after unpacking as described, but it did not help. I am 175 pound and I can feel the springs on my back when I lay down. The memory foam layer is very thing an useless. I do not recommend this mattress at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - Other comparisons are better for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Linenspa 8" Twin Mattress and found it not as good as the PrimaSleep 8" Premium Cool Memory Foam Twin Mattress. I found the bed to be too firm and uncomfortable. The bed did come with a smell that I would describe as "Wet Paint". It comes packaged very well and does come with instructions. The PrimaSleep Mattress was more comfortable and cheaper than the LinenSpa. If the Linenspa mattress were a cheaper cost than I would recommend it but as priced I believe there are better choices to be made. Returns are a hassle as you will be charged a restocking fee or shipping fee for pick up on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed so far.
customer_reviews.text: I should have known a mattress in a box was too good to be true. I will start with it was packed well and the box arrived without a flaw. There isn't one bit of firmness! When I lay on it, it melts down like a marshmallow. I will definitely buy a box spring. This was purchased for my guest room, but I will sleep on it one night and come back for a final review on how it sleeps. And lastly, it's not a full 8 inches on its corners. It's as if its the corners take the brunt of being stuffed into a box and never fully expand.
customer_reviews.author: TakeAPic

customer_reviews.title: $100 Twin of Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I read some article about mattress stores getting mad at Amazon and online stores for undersellling them, which made me wonder how good could a mattress online really be? I bought the $100-ish Twin of this mattress and it came in a smaller than expected box, but it expanded almost immediately and didn't have any noticeable smell that filled my house. I let it expand for 2 days before using it, and it feels like any multi-hundred dollar twin I've bought in the past. I don't think I'm ever going to a mattress store again
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: BED BUGS DO NOT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: It does not deserve a single star, rather go to Big Lots or Walmart and get it,do not waste ur time...full of bed bugs I just can not believe that they still actually sell them. Our friend ordered it thru us, and I was scared because lots of reviews is about bed bugs,and okay maybe he will be lucky...ooh no we opened a package outside and you can see thru plastic wrap lots of bugs,ooh no RETURNED. Wish I took some pictures
customer_reviews.author: Neira

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old was over the Top. I even slept on it one night. I am about 240 this Mattress had zero problem supporting me. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sip

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest- I felt obligated to leave a review because I rely on them and read through hundreds on here before I chose to purchase one. We bought one for my teenage son, and within a week, I had convinced my sister to also buy one for my nephew. Excellent product- very supportive and very comfortable. We did the 8” for a loft bed, but for a traditional bed, I’d recommend the 10-12” because it does compress with the memory foam. The innerspring coils are very supportive. Watching the mattress expand was fascinating lol.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Vanover

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy/weak mattress springs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kid's bedroom. He loves it. Just note that the springs don't feel very supportive. For a child, they are probably strong enough, but when an adult sits on the mattress, he or she will sink because the springs will compress *ALL* the way, not just "a little." But it's a cheap mattress and corners have to be cut somewhere. If you need a twin-bed for a 50-pound child or something that sits in a guest-room and is rarely used, it's great! But if you're an adult looking for a twin mattress, I would spend more money for a more supportive mattress.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Trusted other reviews ... now I wonder
customer_reviews.text: This bed is barely worth the $99 price I felt fortunate enough to pay. Yes my gut said you get what you pay for, but the reviews seem to say give it a shot. If it were easier to return I would, but alas it would be difficult and I haven't got time. This bed just feels cheap and the memory foam part of it is so worthless I don't have words. Perhaps this is a mattress designed for small children? I would definitely not recommend and will probably give to my son and get a new mattress. Will be going to a mattress store this time. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Aschoff

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable - great for side and belly sleepers
customer_reviews.text: First off, if you can, sleep on your back on a softer bed. This bed is medium to hard firmness, which is ideal for side and belly sleepers, but it is healthier to sleep on your back on a softer bed. That being said, I can't sleep on my back comfortably, so this bed rocks. They get it in a fairly short space and I don't feel the need to add extra padding. If I'm sitting up in it for a long period of time, my butt doesn't go numb or anything as well. Great bed. Don't bother spending like a bajillion dollars at a mattress store, these ones are great.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Mattress When Needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I had friends coming to visit and I needed to provide accommodations asap. It was really convenient to be able to get brand new mattresses quickly. They do expand once you take them out of the bag. However, I found them to be too thin for everyday use. So good for out of town visitors, but they are not the most comfortable for long term use (unless maybe you stack one on the other).
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly SURPRISED :)
customer_reviews.text: From reading all the horrible reviews about bed bugs, i was VERYYYY hesitant in buying this mattress. but for the price, and for what we needed it for, it was really the only one in our budget. so we gave it a shot. once i got it delievered, i inspected that thing like no other before opening the plastic part. NO BED BUGS. when i took it out of the plastic and let it unravel, i inspected it like no other. NO BED BUGS. i felt it, and it actually was very comfortable feeling. you cant feel the springs and there were no bed bugs. very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jordan Howard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think. JUST BUY IT.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Twin mattress for myself and it was amazing. To be honest I was a bit skeptical due to the ‘bedbugs’ related reviews but it was worth it. I also want to let you guys know that this is not a sponsored review or anything. Let me tell you something. If you are a college student like me or if you are on a small budget then this is a great mattress. Even if you are not on a budget. Don’t buy the expensive ones. BUY this mattress. It was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Jadav

customer_reviews.title: Fine for what it is but it's not a proper mattress
customer_reviews.text: Like most I read all the comments with the bed bugs and bought a bed bug encasement just in case. However when I got the thing I sure could detect nothing amiss. Regarding the mattress itself these thing are amazing. Easy to unpack, expanded just fine and looks good. It's good for a ton of uses as a low cost alternative. However there is nothing medium firm about it and it is not as good as a proper mattress. My advice is if you can afford it, sleep is important to you get a proper mattress. For guests, kids, summer cottages and alternative uses these mattresses can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress.
customer_reviews.text: At first, my wife bought one of this for the kids' room. My son loves his bed. It is indeed very comfortable to sleep on even if it is just 8 inches thick. We bought another one for one of our elderly who was complaining about back pains. Ever since he started using this mattress, his back pains are gone. It is soft enough for comfort, but stiff enough so that you won't feel buried in it. It also feels cool to the back, so you won't get warm easily during summer. We already have 2 of this, and won't hesitate to buy another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: R4LDZ ✅

customer_reviews.title: A very comfy mattress
customer_reviews.text: The important parts: 1. It's firm and comfortable. 2. It does not have a weird smell or outgassing. It had a "new materials smell" which wasn't an issue for about 3 days and now you can hardly smell it. Nothing like the Ikea mattresses which are supposed to be unbearable. 3. It's vacuum packed and pops up to full size when you open the bag. Mine was fully expanded and firm within a few minutes. I've slept on this thing for two weeks and have had restful, comfortable sleeps. No complaints! I'm glad I got this 8" one instead of the 5" one which would have been much too thin.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give less than 1 star
customer_reviews.text: I barely opened this box and found TONS of brown flecks on this mattress. YEP that is right..... BED BUGS.. Do not buy. I opened this outside and immediately sealed the box up. Did not attempt to take this mattress out of the packaging. It is going back. It is on my porch to be picked up because I did not want this disgusting item in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Steska

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy Mattress for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I was not diverted by the few bad reviews. For the price, these mattresses are wonderful. We have had them 3 weeks no with no concerns. We bought two twins for my son’s bunk bed and we couldn't be happier with them. They puffed up to 8 inches within a couple hours. No offgassing or smell whatsoever. Definitely no indication of bedbugs or lack of hygiene! They were delivered less than 24 hours after ordering! They have a 10 year warranty. I’ve fallen asleep on them a couple of times and I find them very comfortable. I can’t imagine anything out there that would be comparable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lit_girl22

customer_reviews.title: THIS CAN'T POSSIBLY BE SAFE
customer_reviews.text: The chemical smell that this mattress is off gassing is so bad that we had to put it outside. I don't know of we will even be able to use it for our child. If we had bought this at a brick and mortar store I would have returned it immediately after opening it. It's comfortable but I think someone could legitimately die if they were to sleep on it, as it smells so toxic right now.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Look- I read the bed bug reviews. When I opened the box- there was speckles from the cardboard of the box. There was absolutely nothing inside of the mattress or the plastic. It’s perfect. For the price I paid- it’s a great option for transitioning my toddler out of a crib. It was easy to move and unbox. I have a feeling if you find bed bugs in your mattress- you had the issue to begin with. This is the 8” mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Marie Foote

customer_reviews.title: Best amazon purchase ever. Total comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly shocked at how comfortable this is. Im 5'11" and 185 lbs. Its perfect. Best amazon purchase ever!!! Oh and bed bugs, those posters dont know what their talking about. There is some lint and spects of carboard debris but easily removed. There are no bed bugs at all. None! Update: I have now had thos for a year and it is in just as good shape as it was when i bought it. I love this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Peredy

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: No bed bugs or any sign of them. Felt like the spring idea with memory fork wound be great but turns out it wasn't. Felt like the bed was too bouncy ah bed I could feel the springs. Maybe not enough memory foam on the top layer of something. Didn't really get comfortable even after a few days so I am definitely returning. Had to call and schedule a return pick up since it's a matress.
customer_reviews.author: J.Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best nights sleep ever!
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased two for my girls new bunk beds. They both enjoy their sleep on them. For my youngest who sleeps on top. She loves it!! She used to only want to sleep in my bed or slept on the couch because her old bed was so uncomfortable. When she got her new bed this is what she said. “ Remember how I used to like to sleep in your bed all the time”. “ I said yeah, well I love sleeping in my new bed it’s even better than yours”.
customer_reviews.author: Erica R.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress in a twin for my son’s new “big boy” bed. I’ve laid on it myself and find it really comfortable, even at 7 months pregnant (5’4” and 155 lb currently). My husband (6’ and 200 lb) also thinks it’s really comfortable, but neither of us have tried sleeping on it. The mattress was nice and clean, no bugs, when it arrived, but it did have a pretty strong chemical odor to it. I read this is very common for memory foam mattresses, and after letting it air out for several days the smell did get better. Overall I’m very pleased with this mattress and hope my toddler son loves it as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress upon seeing thousands of glowing reviews. It was made in Turkey and I suspect they use it there on a wood plank bed or floors. It is so soft that it sinks on my box mattress beds. I weight 200 lb and replacing my old mattress, it sinks completely because the under box mattress is not solid enough. How on earth can four thousand people gave 4.5 stars? Something is fishy. My lesson is not to buy clothing, beddings, furnitures on the net. They sell you a piece of useless junk and they know you cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Back pain in 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this matress for my daughter’s bed and since she is a toddler and doesn’t weight much, I think she is fine sleeping on it, but I slept with her couple of times for an hour or two and I got terrible back pain in like 30 minutes after sleeping. I don’t know what is the reason for it, but it definitely not the most perfect matress
customer_reviews.author: Olga K.

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum sealed = no bugs
customer_reviews.text: To anyone concerned about bed bugs, it comes vacuum sealed, so even if there were bugs (I didn’t see any), that would have killed them. It came quickly and rolled up in a cardboard box, which made it super easy to drag through the house and put into position. Seems comfortable for the price. Looks great on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Agent106

customer_reviews.title: Wish it could have worked out
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was covered with black specks and bugs. I was requested to return the item. However, I did not want to have deal with repacking a possibly bedbug infested mattress. I also didn't want to keep it in my home for several days until the scheduled pickup. I was ordered a replacement over a month ago but that never came
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for childen or as a guests bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my daughter. After ordering I noticed some of the reviews complaining about bed bugs and I started to freak out a bit about my order. The mattress arrived and I looked over the mattress carefully before and after letting it out of its packaging. It's been a week now and no signs of bed bugs thank goodness. This mattress is so comfortable! Idk how it would do with a full size adult sleeping on the matress every night. But for a guest bed or childs bed this is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 yr old has less sleeping problems
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Soft. Cheap. (no bugs, I think people are just trying to get free mattresses) We got the twin and the full for the bunk beds. They're equally comfortable and cost combined less than one "cheap" full. Happy for price, and if my little monsters eat, shred, or run enough bodily fluids and spilled liquids through them to ruin them, I will be replacing them with these mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 year old daughter and it’s super soft, supportive, and nice way nicer than I expected actually. I can’t believe it was so inexpensive. I didn’t have any issues with dirt or bugs and everything came nicely vacuum sealed. This mattress seems like it’s built to last too which my bank account will appreciate. I’ll definitely be buying from this company again! Me and little one are completely satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: mandi

customer_reviews.title: This mattress exceeded all expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress exceeded all expectations! I went in apprehensive when purchasing this mattress, but I needed something quickly and at an affordable price. It arrived promptly and I set it up immediately. Within a few hours it was fully inflated and upon laying on it, it felt extremely comfortable. I had the best nights of sleep I’d had in a while my first week, and it is still going strong after a little over six months. I’m 330lbs and It still holds its shape and never sinks or anything of the sort. Great buy and perfect value!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to purchase because of the bad reviews, but decided to give it a chance. I'm so glad I did! It came in two days, tightly boxed and easy to handle. Layed it out on the box spring and took off the outer plastic. Started hearing air whooshing immediately. Gently removed the inner plastic and boom, the mattress was fully inflated. Light weight enough to position, but firm enough to hold shape. No odor, no bugs🙄! This mattress is amazing. Fits the frame perfectly - twin. Very comfortable. Soft topper. I will probably get two more in the near future. Worth every dime!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ... read a lot of reviews before purchasing taking the good and bad and decided for the price it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before purchasing taking the good and bad and decided for the price it was worth it to try. It was worth it! It was fun to open and easy to set up. We bought it for my two year old son and he loves it. It’s very comfy but I would recommend the twin for children. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Bragg

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty much what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: This is a $100 mattress, so don’t expect the comfort of a more expensive one. It goes on my kids bunk bed and so I’ve napped on it once and it was fine. I saw all the reviews about bed bugs and so inspected the mattress on our hardwood and didn’t see any bedbugs/bugs/black marks/etc on either mattress we purchased. I obviously can’t speak to any one else’s experience though.
customer_reviews.author: Amber 567

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 beds online in the past, so I'm no stranger to the vacuum sealed bed. I was a little nervous about this one though given the amazing price ($99!). But, I recently acquired a daybed with trundle and I needed 2 inexpensive beds for kids. This definitely filled the bill. This is a great mattress especially for the price. It is firm yet slightly soft. I prefer my mattresses firm so it's perfect. I do believe I may sleep on it sometimes too.
customer_reviews.author: SweetMagnolia24

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has been great,best I've slept in years,,so glad I made the choice to buy this mattress,I downsized my bed from a queen to this double,its perfect,and I have more room in the bedroom all around,I'm 5'4 so it works out really good for me,, a double bed is great if your a small person,,if your a 6ft person your feet will hang over,lol,but even so,,u will sleep good that's for sure :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: when they say firm, they mean FIRM
customer_reviews.text: Unpacking was no problem. Quality overall seems good. And, ignore the reviews about bugs, pretty sure they're damaging on purpose. You get what you pay for. There's no "medium" about it, this thing is firm with a capital F. Not very comfortable to lay on. I'm pretty much forced to look into a gel foam topper or something to cushion the top. I wake up and my shoulder is killing me, or I feel unrested. Haven't had a decent night's sleep since I got this. Make sure to get some kind of gel topper at least 3" or more. I'm 5'10" 200 just for reference.
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Uggggh how did this rate high?
customer_reviews.text: I read a TON of great reviews & then just ones about bedbugs (which are easy to get rid of with alchocol - either drink & ignore or spray on the mattress & it kills them) BUT this is NOT comfortable in the slightest - 2 inches smaller than it says & you can hear the springs...the ground on a desert island surrounded by bedbugs is more comfortable than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bets

customer_reviews.title: Bed bugs? Oh please
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress for my guest room, and I read the reviews about the bedbugs. I am literally laughing out loud because as a social worker I know all about bedbugs. In the description of this item it clearly states that there may be brown particles on the mattress, however mine didn’t have them. And they didn’t have bedbugs either 😂. How cute that people are trying to say these mattresses come with bedbugs... Anyways the mattress is absolutely perfect would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RaRa

customer_reviews.title: Bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was one of the unlucky ones that received this bed with uninvited bed bug guests. I’m extremely grossed out to find out that I have been sleeping with bed bugs and poop deposit. The bed is very comfortable though, but still bed bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be BUG FREE!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews, indicating "BED BUGS", we were concerned about purchasing this mattress. Before undoing the wrapping securing the rolled up mattress we very carefully searched for any sign of "BUGS". Unwrapped and continued BUG search, NONE FOUND! Not a trace of any Live or Dead BUGS! Mattress fluffed up to full size and appears to be of good quality for the price. Time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: R J Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Great Twin Mattress
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I ordered a second mattress and it is perfect! Expanded to the 8” described. VERY comfortable. You cannot beat this price and product, especially for a daybed... I’m using it for grandsons, don’t know how it would be for a heavy adult, but also don’t think that’s what they’re made for.... I ordered a twin for our daybed. It is everything I had hoped for.... 8” thick of comfort. My husband thought it was comfortable too. No problems whatsoever. So I will now order a second one for the trundle and have the grandsons overnight!
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Just fine for children
customer_reviews.text: I read pretty much all the reviews. There were certainly no bed bugs. I chose to buy this mattres for my 2.5 year old daughter because it was recommended by an online editorial and because I needed it for a day bed and/or trundle for occasional use and just for a handful of years. Buying it for an adult for every day expecting to last for more than 6 months would not cross my mind. Its ok for my purpose but not outside of that. I laid on the mattress with my daughter and it felt comfortable and firm which is exactly what i wanted for my daughter. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DGR

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, presently surprised
customer_reviews.text: It's held up well over a year later. Full disclosure, I tried to return it because I read reviews AFTER I purchased it that some were delivered with bed bugs and in NYC we can't mess around with that kind of threat. Needless to say, I was told that it couldn't be returned, so we did take that chance be we opted to open it up outside and give it an eagle eye inspection. Not a bug in sight, put a protective cover on it, brought it inside. No problems at all. It's worked nicely, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the negativity you read!!
customer_reviews.text: First let me settle this bedbug thing. This mattress came so compressed theres no way anything can live in it. If you found bedbugs on it its because you already had them and didnt know it. This mattress is so comfortable and super clean. The box came dinged up a bit but there was nothing wrong with the packaging of the mattress. I highly recommend this mattress and can only hope as people are reading the reviews you do understand that bedbugs need oxygen like the rest of us and a mattress that is that compressed for days theres no way something is living in it. Especially by the time it arrives. 5 stars ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: NO BEDS BUGS!!
customer_reviews.text: IM SORRY THIS BED DID NOT COME WITH BED BUGS! THIS MATREESS IS VERY COMFORTABLE EASY TO ASSEMBLE. I PULLED THE MATREESS OUT OF THE BOX CUT THE PLASTIC IT STARTED TO RAISE. LET IT SIT FOR 48HR I GOT THIS MATREESS FOR MY 17YR SON HE 6'4 250LB . HIS OLD BED HE COMPLAIN ABOUT BACK AND LEG PAINS . I CANT HAVE THAT SO I ORDERED HIM A BED I WANTED COMFORTABLE FOR HIM I WAS SCARED BUT IM GLAD I ORDERED. HE HUGED ME ALL DAY I FELT LIKE A PROUD MOM . HE HAPPY IM HAPPY . HAPPY CUSTOMER 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kikapoo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: thicker than I was expecting. I bought for my 6yo daughter, but I’ve laid in it and it’s comfortable, doesn’t make any weird squeaking or creaking noises (I bought a spring mattress once that did this and it was SO loud). The top does feel a little wobbly, at first I thought it might be the bed frame, but it was the mattress. With that said, it’s only a twin size I doubt I’d feel that way if it was a wider mattress and my daughter has laid in it and loves it! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mags P

customer_reviews.title: Sleep has never been better
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had various expensive mattresses before such as Tempurpedic, Sealeys, BeautyRest...etc. Linenspa is probably one of the best mattresses I’ve ever had. I’m 5ft-10” & 220lbs and this mattress holds up firm yet plush and adjusts to my body and weird sleeping habits - sideways, stomach, curled...etc. my back, hip and leg pains have been reduced to a very minimum after about 1-2 weeks of using this mattress. I also sleep throughout the night which is a blessing and wake up fresh as if I got plenty of rest. For $98, I wouldn’t buy anything other than Linenspa.
customer_reviews.author: Manish V Mahajan

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: We got this mattress for our daughter and I wasn't expecting much from a cheap mattress, but I was very surprised by the quality. It is a spring mattress with a small layer of memory foam on top. It is surprisingly comfortable and I wouldn't mind sleeping on it. We loved it so much we got another one for our other daughter. I only wish it came in grey or a different color. Otherwise can't complain and glad we were able to save money and have our daughters sleep on a surprisingly comfortable mattress! Thanks Linen spa! Both came rolled up, nice and compact for shipping and also dissappointed they didn't come with bedbugs like others have suggested 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Got exactly what I wanted for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered double 8 inch twin beds for my niece and nephew to stay temporarily, and I got exactly what I wanted. The packaging was impressive and easy going like those vacuum storage bags. I paired the mattresses with "Zinus Joseph 6 inch" frames which are low to the ground for the toddlers and an awesome match, no boxspring needed! I read a lot of reviews before my purchase, positives outweighed the negatives and worked out well! $400 total for mattresses and frames all together.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: good mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the twin mattress for a teen. Mattress was easy to set up. It took about two minutes for mattress to take shape. Teen likes the soft foam top and support of the springs. Would describe overall as medium/firm. After reading reviews, I was super paranoid about bedbugs and examined the mattress for first 2-3 days. No bugs. Teen has been using mattress for about a week. So far I am pleased with this purchase and hope the mattress holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2KL

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected - no bed bugs!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa! Pretty impressed with this thing! I work during the nights so I’m asleep during the day (typically in my son’s room, which is the quietest). I got this just because he needed another mattress in his bunk bed. I was going to use it just as my “day shift” sleeping bed. My son laid on it and really liked it compared to his. We ended up switching since this was way more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: CKrup

customer_reviews.title: Blood stain???
customer_reviews.text: So the bed is very comfortable and it unrolled very quickly and is cool and all BUT when I first inspected it after unrolling there was a spot the size of a quarter of very obvious bright red blood.... the picture is hours after I scrubbed it HARD with numerous cleaners. I’m livid about this. Especially because I’ve been waiting to buy a bed (this!) for weeks and now that I finally have it, it’s got some random guys blood on it??? In the middle of a PANDEMIC you allow people to obviously not inspect things before packaging them..... BTW the box it came shipped in was wide open....
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Christman

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one for my 19 yo son and 10 yo daughter. Both of the kids say they sleep great. I have laid on them and they feel very comfortable, so much so, I'm thinking of ordering one for my own bed. I would call the firmness a medium firm. As far as longevity, I can't comment on that because we just got them, if anything changes, I'll update my review. Overall, pleasantly surprised at this price point. These are a slightly heavy, so may require a little help unboxing and expanding.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Glad we chose this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We got our kids a bunk bed this year and all we needed was a twin mattress since we already had a full mattress. I looked for days on amazon and other stores comparing prices and reviews. I finally settled for this one and I’m so glad I did. My kids were so excited when it arrived that they helped pull it out of the box. They were so amazed how quickly and nicely it inflated once we opened the plastic wrap. My kids laid on it right away and so did I. It really is good quality. No bad smells or anything! Will buy again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: JRB29

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I used this mattress in my office/guest room. It came compressed, rolled up and in a box. I found it easier to unbox it before taking it up the stairs. Upon removing the plastic it quickly began to "open up". I suggest having it on the bed as you remove the plastic. I sit on the bed regularly, it's a daybed used as a sofa. It's not the most comfortable, but it's not at all uncomfortable. It's a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: candice johnson

customer_reviews.title: No free return
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t mention that you will lose 20 dollars if you return item. Also product isn’t as thick as advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Han duong

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons room. Hoping he would sleep in his room after decorating it with his favorite characters. I must say I have probably slept in the bed more. He is still in our bed and calls his room the "Room where his close are kept". Anyway, I am very impressed with how comfy the mattress is for the price. I am not sure it is best though for kids or a guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Mindymelt

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & comfy
customer_reviews.text: It came wrapped in two layers of plastic inside a box. There were specks in the plastic but I looked at them with a magnifier and they were just specks, not bugs. It inflated properly and is a lot more comfortable than my old arrangement .. a futon on top of an airbed, which I slept on for WAY too long .. my back doesn't hurt nearly as bad anymore. I've been sleeping on the new mattress for about a month now and no bugs bit me so it must have been clean. I'm satisfied with it. If it lasts two years it will have been worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress for a daybed so that we had an extra bed when we get guests. Well a week ago we had guests so I got to try this out and I was not happy with this mattress!! I did not sleep very well. I purchased because it was Amazon Pick but I should have purchased the Modway Aveline 8" Gel Infused Memory Foam Mattress because I had purchased a couple for the grand kids and I did get to sleep on it and it was very very comfortable!! I wish I would have thought about it when I was looking for a mattress!!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: 2 Year Anniversary Review
customer_reviews.text: The positive reviews motivated me to select this mattress. I've had it for two years now. It retained its fitness for about the first year. Sadly, the mattress is now uneven at best and lost almost all of its original integrity. I'm 5'6" and weigh 135 Lbs so I can't imagine just how much faster it would have broken down if I were bigger. I hate writing bad reviews, but I am doing so because I presume many of you wish to purchase a durable mattress. Well, this ain't it.
customer_reviews.author: J Medina

customer_reviews.title: Want to buy two more
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to purchase this mattress because of the many reviews claiming to have bed bugs. Then I saw that it was a ton of positive reviews and gave it a shot. Though the box was a bit bruised, probably from shipping, the packaging is sealed air tight to keep the mattress compressed to fit on the box. No way there could be bed bugs unless it was placed there by the factory who manufactured the mattress. I will be purchasing two more for my other two kids. For $100 this mattress is comfortable as heck not to mention.
customer_reviews.author: Colon

customer_reviews.title: Great Value- Great Deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased our 2nd & 3rd twin mattresses & they arrived yesterday. (We just gave away our first purchase to a child that needed a bed.) You can’t beat the price! We use them in our guest bedroom for the grandkids & they are comfortable- I have slept on them. There are NO bed bugs. As a elementary teacher I know what bed bugs look like! No idea why anyone would say that! (Must work for a mattress company?) The most fun part is cutting away the plastic & watching the bed expand!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny1527

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first "bed in a bag." It arrived rolled up and vacuum-sealed. After I broke the seal on the plastic packaging, it immediately began to inflate. Following the directions, I let it sit to continue inflating for two days. The mattress is incredibly comfortable. Well worth over $100. The only reason I did not give it 5-stars for pain relief is that there are much more expensive but better, mattresses out there. This mattress is a great value for its price/comfort. My only other concern is how long will it last me? I'll be delighted if it lasts longer than 12 months and stunned if it is still comfortable after 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a nice mattress, however...I purchased it for a hospital bed (it was being promoted as a hospital bed mattress so I thought no problems) ... It’s a bit too wide making it almost impossible to slide the side rails up and down. The length is a bit too short. It’s delivered compressed so trying to roll-up and return would be impossible .... but it is comfy and would be fine on a regular bed frame, measure you’re bed frame first.
customer_reviews.author: sassy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I got the wrong firmness but it’s just not comfortable. It’s been more than a year and it’s never become a comfortable bed. I wake up with back pain if I lay on my back or stomach. It’s strictly meant for side sleep and even then it’s still not comfortable. It’s just way too stiff. I haven’t slept in it for months now. I choose to sleep on the couch because I don’t want to spend more money on a mattress. My husband just endures the uncomfortable and sleepless nights.
customer_reviews.author: Lorlee

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress, Especially for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress for my 9-year-old son because his was older than him and he was always wanting to sleep on the couch, and it has been fantastic. We were able to easily open it up and get it set up quickly, and he even slept on it that night. There was a very slight smell from the processing or packaging of the mattress at first, if I put my nose right up to it, but it went away quickly. It is very comfortable and seems to be of great quality. We've had it for a few months now with no bowing, sagging or any issues at all. And our son actually likes sleeping in his bed again!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna R.

customer_reviews.title: Too Soft
customer_reviews.text: Given the good reviews, I bought this hoping it'd be as good as the more-expensive-but-less-reviewed mattress I bought for my other child. I'm sorry I did because this mattress is overly-soft. I sleep on a memory-foam mattress myself, so I like them, but what's on top of this thing must be the weakest memory foam made. My 2.5yr-old sinks into it. If there was a way to return this, I would. I guess it's bound to be a trundle mattress.
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: This is SOO comfy
customer_reviews.text: This came recommended with the Amazon Basics foldable bed frame and I am soooo glad I got it. Great value - one of the least expensive mattresses out there - and honestly it's more comfortable than my 7 year old, $400 hybrid air spring/memory foam queen mattress. Using this as a daybed in an office but when my current mattress in my bed bites the dust I'm replacing it with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Hiphopgroovy

customer_reviews.title: An honest review.
customer_reviews.text: Have to say I’m pretty bummed. I read a lot of the reviews that raved about this mattress and what I received did not fit those rave reviews. We have other twin mattresses that are a different brand and made of gel memory foam, no springs. I thought by saving myself $50 that I’d try these out since the reviews were incredible but this mattress is so uncomfortable. It’s like someone slapped a piece of foam on top of a bunch of springs that you sink into. It’s also super light weight and moves around on top of the box spring. If it wasn’t such a pain to return I would have but keeping it and cutting my losses.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived I had it set up in minutes. VERY comfortable and so far seems pretty durable. I'm a grown adult and I sleep on this as my only bed. Since I've gotten it i don't have anymore neck or back pain. For the price, even if it only lasts me 6 months or a year (which I doubt), I'd still order this again for the no hassle deliver/set up and super comfort. At $100 I'd have could buy this 8-10 times before i'd spend as much as some mattresses would cost me. CRAZY. If you're on the fence about this one, get off and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress for a guest room trundle bed. We had read and we agree that the hybrid style mattress was comfortable without a box spring. The trundle bed only allowed 10" between the top and bottom frames. This mattress worked perfectly. I am 210 lb and my wife 120 lb. We both tried it out and found it very comfortable. The springs under the foam top provides support. We did not notice any spring noise or foam smell (two of our pre-buy concerns). We plan to buy another one of these for the top bed. We found this to be a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sparty

customer_reviews.title: really good mattress
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son as he got a bunk bed and needs 2 mattress. Buying 2 mattress is expensive so we decided to try Linenspa and we were surprised. it comes in a box and expanded once oped. This mattress is realistically compared to a 300-400 mattress at a local furniture store so Im happy we picked it up for 1/3 of that and it SHOULD matter that we didnt have to go pick it up as it was delivered to our door through the mail. Beware this thing is heavy. Good mattress though!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Nights Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 mattresses for all 3 of my boys and they absolutely loved them! They said it was the best nights sleep they had ever had. Very comfortable! I love that the mattresses were affordable, my family lives from paycheck to paycheck so an affordable mattress with good qualities is 5 stars for me! Will definitely buy again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Barker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for the value
customer_reviews.text: For a first time purchaser, this definitely fits the bill for a apartment move in... great value. Also where are you going to find another 100$ full size mattress that is reliably and rather quite comfortable?
customer_reviews.author: Second Options

customer_reviews.title: Adequate, and much more than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: For a guest bedroom, it's going to be perfect. It was easy to carry upstairs, unpack, and set up. I did accidentally nick with mattress with my scissors while trying to cut the plastic, but it survived. It quickly took shape and I let it rest for a week before testing it. It's bouncy but comfortable enough, I feel like I could sleep on it if I had to. It'll be perfect for a guest bed. If it were going to be used regularly by a large adult or more than one person, I'd go thicker. Also, there were no bed bugs, I don't think that's a legitimate concern.
customer_reviews.author: ART

customer_reviews.title: soft mattress win.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bed. Soft. Nicely packed. However I am bummed its a littlet softer than expected. Even softer than my nectar and Ashley memory foam mattresses. Works nice though bc we bought it for a dog bed for our large breed dogs so great for them but as a heads up to human sleepers its a tad soft. Of youre looking for a soft mattress look no further
customer_reviews.author: DoWondersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No signs of bed bugs, or any bits of matter other than mattresses.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't decided if I like it yet. I had to get rid of my old mattresses. I had to replace three of them. All for Adults. They certainly seem shorter than 8 inchs, the 8 inch version anyway. Will update. They are reasonably comfortable. Update: So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't be hesitant !
customer_reviews.text: Some of the other reviews of this mattress had me worried. I bought the mattress for my 5 year old son and he's had no complaints. I've laid on the bed to watch movies with him-it's comfortable and supports the weight of both of us . Both my sister and brother-in-law have slept all night on the bed without issues. Very clean and reasonably priced product. Value for money is outstanding. Ended up buying a second one a few months later for my boyfriends daughter when she transitioned from a toddler bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Linenspa 8 Inch Memory Foam and Innerspring Hybrid-Mattress - Medium-Firm Feel - Twin
product_meta.description: Size:Twin| Style Name:8 Inch Mattress OnlyAdd the pressure point relief of memory foam to the reliable support of a traditional spring mattress, and you have the revolutionary comfort of the hybrid mattress. A layer of memory foam is quilted in the soft, knit cover and placed over a 1.5 inch layer of comfort foam to create an incredibly comfortable sleep surface. The foam conforms to the unique curves of your body to minimize pressure points. Beneath the foam top, 6 inch steel coils offer the support and durability of a spring mattress. This design distributes body weight to contour and support as you sleep. The spring layer provides the traditional bounce many like in an innerspring mattress, and improves the breathability of the mattress. This mattress is rolled and shipped in a box for convenient delivery and setup. Simply take the box to the proper room, Carefully remove packaging, and watch as the mattress expands to its true size. This mattress comes with a 10 year U.S. warranty that guards against manufacturer defect.
feature_bullets: 8 inch hybrid mattress combine hypallergenic memory foam with the traditional support of an innerspring mattress for a medium-firm feel perfect for kids rooms, guest beds, or an affordable low-profile option
A plush layer of memory foam helps align the spine to minimize pressure points for increased comfort
Finished with a cozy knit cover, this mattress is compressed as a bed in a box for convenient delivery and setup
Available in a medium firm 8 inch profile, a medium 10 inch profile, or a plush 12 inch profile that also features gel infusions and individually encased coils
Packaging process may leave small brown flecks called carbons in the mattress packaging; These carbons are harmless pieces of plastic and will not stick to your mattress; 10 year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars36,638 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
